text: The Moon Maiden is a science fiction novel by Garrett P. Serviss. It was first published in book form in 1978 by William L. Crawford, without imprint, in an edition of 500 copies. The novel originally appeared in the magazine Argosy in 1915. ==Plot introduction== The novel concerns a love tale and lunar beings who have been guiding the earth for millennia. ==References== * * * Category:1915 American novels Category:1915 science fiction novels Category:American science fiction novels Category:Works originally published in Argosy (magazine)
title: The Moon Maiden
